message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you this product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I'm confident it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a fantastic price point that allows you to secure this asset while still leaving room for significant profit. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
